DescribeReportCreation.name: DescribeReportCreation
DescribeReportCreation.description: Describe the status of the StartReportCreation operation.

GetComplianceSummary.name: GetComplianceSummary
GetComplianceSummary.description:
Get a table that shows counts of resources that are noncompliant with their effective
                                                tag policies.

GetResources.name: GetResources
GetResources.description: Get tagged AWS resources that match the given tag filters

GetTagKeys.name: GetTagKeys
GetTagKeys.description: Get all tagKeys for the account in the specific region

GetTagValues.name: GetTagValues
GetTagValues.description: Get all tagValues for the account in the specific region

StartReportCreation.name: StartReportCreation
StartReportCreation.description:
Generate a report that lists all tagged resources in accounts across your organization,
                                                and whether each resource is compliant with the effective tag policy.
